name: Bill's Analysis
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 2 Trainer cards you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Black Market Prism Star
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Brock's Grit
rules: Shuffle 6 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Buff Padding
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to has a Retreat Cost of exactly 4, it gets +50 HP.

name: Dana
rules: You can play this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Stage 2 Pokémon.Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Dangerous Drill
rules: You can play this card only if you discard a Darkness Pokémon from your hand.Discard a Pokémon Tool or Special Energy card from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon, or discard any Stadium card in play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Electrocharger
rules: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, shuffle an Electropower card from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Erika's Hospitality
rules: You can play this card only if you have 4 or fewer other cards in your hand.Draw a card for each of your opponent's Pokémon in play.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Evelyn
rules: You can play this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Stage 1 Pokémon.Draw 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Fairy Charm UB
rules: Prevent all damage done to the Fairy Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Ultra Beast Pokémon-GX and Ultra Beast Pokémon-EX.

name: Grass Memory
rules: The Silvally-GX this card is attached to is a Grass Pokémon.

name: Ingo & Emmet
rules: Look at the top card of your deck, and then choose 1:• Discard your hand and draw 5 cards.• Discard your hand and draw 5 cards from the bottom of your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Jasmine
rules: Search your deck for a Metal Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you go second and it's your first turn, search for 5 Metal Pokémon instead of 1. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Judge Whistle
rules: Choose 1:• Draw a card.• Put a Judge card from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Lavender Town
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may have their opponent reveal their hand.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Metal Goggles
rules: The Metal Pokémon this card is attached to takes 30 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and your opponent's attacks and Abilities can't put damage counters on it.

name: Morgan
rules: You can play this card only if you discard Dana, Evelyn, and Nita from your hand.Look at the top 12 cards of your deck and attach any number of Energy cards you find there to your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nanu
rules: Choose a Basic Darkness Pokémon in your discard pile. Switch it with 1 of your Pokémon in play. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nita
rules: You can play this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon.Put an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon on top of their deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Communication
rules: Reveal a Pokémon in your hand and put it on top of your deck. If you do, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Return Label
rules: Put a card from your opponent's discard pile on the bottom of their deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Sabrina's Suggestion
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Unidentified Fossil
rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Colorless Basic Pokémon. At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may discard this card from play.This card can't retreat.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Viridian Forest
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may discard a card from their hand. If they do, that player searches their deck for a basic Energy card, reveals it, and puts it into their hand. Then, that player shuffles their deck.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Water Memory
rules: The Silvally-GX this card is attached to is a Water Pokémon.

name: Wondrous Labyrinth Prism Star
rules: The attacks of non-Fairy Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) cost Colorless more.Whenever any player plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Stadium card.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

attacks.name: Pollen Hazard
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Solar Beam
attacks.text: GGCC+ Evergreen-GX 180 Heal all damage from this Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Grass Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), shuffle all cards from your discard pile into your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Super Splash
attacks.text: W+ Towering Splash-GX 10 If this Pokémon has at least 7 extra Water Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Super Splash
attacks.text: W+ Towering Splash-GX 10 If this Pokémon has at least 7 extra Water Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Full Blitz
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Lightning Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. LLL+ Tag Bolt-GX 200 If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Lightning Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Power Recharge
attacks.text: Put all Electropower cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Impact Bolt
attacks.text: Discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electrical-GX
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 7 Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 50 damage for each Trainer card you find there. P+ Horror House-GX Your opponent can't play any cards from their hand during their next turn. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Psychic Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), each player draws cards until they have 7 cards in their hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 50 damage for each Trainer card you find there. P+ Horror House-GX Your opponent can't play any cards from their hand during their next turn. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Psychic Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), each player draws cards until they have 7 cards in their hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Rogue Ring
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Dark Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Dark Strike during your next turn.

attacks.name: Devilish Hands-GX
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX 6 times. (You can choose the same Pokémon more than once.) For each time you chose a Pokémon, do 30 damage to it. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Scar Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 3 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for up to 3 Darkness Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Crushing Punch
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Darkest Tornado-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Metal Symbol
abilities.text: Each of your Pokémon that has any Metal Energy attached to it can't be affected by any Special Conditions. Remove any Special Conditions affecting those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dueling Saber
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Iron Rule-GX
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, their Pokémon can't attack. (This includes Pokémon that come into play on that turn.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Buster Purge
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon. P+ Aero Unit-GX Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to it during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Buster Purge
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon. P+ Aero Unit-GX Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to it during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Cheer Up
attacks.text: Attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dump Truck Press
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 120 more damage. CCCC+ Megaton Friends-GX 210 If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), draw cards until you have 10 cards in your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Brock's Grit
rules: Shuffle 6 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Dana
rules: You can play this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Stage 2 Pokémon.Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Erika's Hospitality
rules: You can play this card only if you have 4 or fewer other cards in your hand.Draw a card for each of your opponent's Pokémon in play.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Evelyn
rules: You can play this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Stage 1 Pokémon.Draw 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ingo & Emmet
rules: Look at the top card of your deck, and then choose 1:• Discard your hand and draw 5 cards.• Discard your hand and draw 5 cards from the bottom of your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Jasmine
rules: Search your deck for a Metal Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you go second and it's your first turn, search for 5 Metal Pokémon instead of 1. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Morgan
rules: You can play this card only if you discard Dana, Evelyn, and Nita from your hand.Look at the top 12 cards of your deck and attach any number of Energy cards you find there to your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nanu
rules: Choose a Basic Darkness Pokémon in your discard pile. Switch it with 1 of your Pokémon in play. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nita
rules: You can play this card only if your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon.Put an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon on top of their deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Sabrina's Suggestion
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Dangerous Drill
rules: You can play this card only if you discard a Darkness Pokémon from your hand.Discard a Pokémon Tool or Special Energy card from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon, or discard any Stadium card in play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Electrocharger
rules: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, shuffle an Electropower card from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Judge Whistle
rules: Choose 1:• Draw a card.• Put a Judge card from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Metal Goggles
rules: The Metal Pokémon this card is attached to takes 30 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and your opponent's attacks and Abilities can't put damage counters on it.

name: Pokémon Communication
rules: Reveal a Pokémon in your hand and put it on top of your deck. If you do, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
